DocAttribute.Name: RelatingActor
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the information about the actor. It comprises the information about the person or organization and its addresses.

DocAttribute.Name: ActingRole
DocAttribute.Documentation: Role of the actor played within the context of the assignment to the object(s).

DocWhereRule.Name: NoSelfReference
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance to with the relation points shall not be contained in the set of _RelatedObjects_.
